name: Wrapped BTC (Fuse)
description: WBTC v2 is the updated bridged version of Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) on the Fuse Network, powered by LayerZero. It enables users to bring BTC liquidity into the Fuse ecosystem for DeFi usage, including trading, lending, and future yield products. This version replaces the legacy WBTC v1 bridged via the deprecated Voltage bridge and ensures improved interoperability, security, and composability with Fuseâ€™s growing Layer 2 infrastructure.
